title: Daily Bias Explained PO3 + Tips
description: Understanding daily bias through PO3 phases and practical implementation tips.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• PO3 phases explained
• Accumulation, Manipulation, Distribution details
• Daily bias construction
• Combining PO3 with bias
• Practical trading tips
• Timing precision with phases

quiz.question: PO3 stands for:
quiz.explanation: PO3 stands for Power of Three, the three-phase market model.

quiz.question: PO3 phases are:
quiz.explanation: The three phases are distinctly: Accumulation (base building), Manipulation (trapping), and Distribution (selling).

quiz.question: Manipulation phase usually:
quiz.explanation: Manipulation phase grabs stops and liquidity to trap traders before the main move.

quiz.question: Distribution phase delivers:
quiz.explanation: Distribution is when the main expansion move occurs, delivering profits.

quiz.question: Daily bias combined with PO3 improves:
quiz.explanation: Combining daily bias with PO3 phases provides superior timing and entry precision.
